title: [Large-Scale] Self-Directed Elementary Science Learning Design Using Digital Media

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Digital media-based science education for elementary students conducted by professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, applying the ADDIE model and implemented in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can design science experiment processes with at least 80% accuracy using digital media tools
Learners can explain connections between science concepts with at least 75% accuracy through mobile-based interactive content
Learners can systematically record and share observation results in digital portfolios and perform peer feedback at least three times

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
